summary: Fusing the 3000 year-old tradition of Chinese acrobatic arts with the multidisciplinary approach of Cirque du Soleil, Dralion draws its inspiration from Eastern philosophy and it's never ending quest for harmony between man and nature.
cast: Zhao Jian|Henriette Gbou|Juliana Neves|Sheetal Gandhi|Luis Pelegrini|Erik Karol|Agnès Sohier|Chen Shi|Lei Na|Peng Rui|Zhaopeng Wang|Luan Leilei|Hao Desheng|Jiang Wei|Ruan Zirong|Shuai Xi|Wang Bing Hua|Wang Yong|Xiong Ying|Yuan Xi|Soizick Hébert|Johnny Filion|Joe De Paul|Eric Goulem|Viktor Kee|Gou Yan|He Miaomiao|Hailing Huang|Li Yang|Lin Ying|Tingting Miao|Ning Ping|Ren Cuicui|Sun Yanhong|Wang Xu|Yang Han|Yi Li|Zhang Wei|Zhong Yu|Wang Jiao|Lei Lulu|Zhou Chunmei|Jo Ann Blondin|Shi Chunlei|Ivo Gueorguiev|Xu Jian|Wang Shoubo|Yuen Yi|Tu Youhong|Shen Yuan
title: Cirque du Soleil: Dralion
